title: DHFWS Purba Medinipur Jobs 2025 - Apply Online for 21 Counsellor, Community Nurse and Other Posts
description: The District Health & Family Welfare Samiti (DHFWS Purba Medinipur) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 21 Counsellor, Community Nurse, Staff Nurse, Doctor, Multi-purpose Worker, and Dental Technician Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, GNM, B.Sc Nursing, 12th, DMLT, Any Degree, Post-graduation, DNB, Diploma, BDS, BHMS, BUMS, and ...
